title: zakservers
author: zakservers
content: We are pleased to announce our new line of offshore Netherlands DC3 servers, we have also included a special promotion AMD Ryzen 9 5950X server in our offshore Netherlands DC3.AMD Ryzen 9 5950X64GB RAM960GB SSD1Gbps Uplink50TB BandwidthPrice: $399/monthTo order: https://www.zakservers.com/index.php?rp=/store/special-servers/netherlands-amd-ryzen-9-5950xYou can also view our all available offshore servers in Netherlands DC3 here: https://www.zakservers.com/offshore-dedicated-servers.phpIf you need a custom configuration do not hesitate to contact with sales. Bitcoin is also accepted as a payment method.
